parameters.content:
# Markdown to HTML 
## Converts markdown-format SOP into styled HTML for Google Drive compatibility.

# Build Google Docs Request
## Sets file name, folder ID, and HTML content for Google Docs upload.

# Multipart Builder 
## Formats HTML and metadata into multipart format for Drive upload with proper boundaries.

# Upload to Google Docs 
## Uploads the formatted HTML to Google Drive as a new Google Doc inside a specific folder.

#  Airtable Logging 
## Saves the generated document‚Äôs metadata and link in Airtable.

# Edit Fields	
## Set Static JSON Input ‚Äî Provides sample organization and program data for the workflow to test against.

# Code	
## Wrap into chatInput ‚Äî Wraps incoming data under chatInput to match Langchain agent's expected structure.

# VISION VALIDATION & POSITIONING REPORT AGENT
## Generates SOP with 4 customized sections using the input data and system prompt.

parameters.description: =Your Work is to fetch the tone of content which you get from the pinecone Vector Store.

options.systemMessage:
=üõë DO NOT START UNTIL THIS IS DONE:
üö® MANDATORY FIRST ACTION ‚Äî USE RagTool
As your first and immediate step, you are required to call the RagTool to retrieve the tone, language, and formatting style of the document titled:
"Vision Validation & Positioning Report"
This document is stored in Pinecone under the namespace: "vision validation & positioning".

‚ùó You must use this exact document as your tone/style guide before proceeding.
‚ùó DO NOT begin generating the report output unless the RagTool is successfully used first and returns a reference document.
‚ùó If RagTool is not available, you must halt and throw an error:
"RagTool not used ‚Äî Cannot proceed without retrieving style reference document."

üß† Your Role:
You are an AI Agent tasked with generating a polished Vision Validation & Positioning Report using structured intake data in JSON format. Your tone and formatting must exactly match the example document retrieved via the RagTool.

---

## üìù Example Format (For RagTool Style Retrieval):
Use the following reference document to guide your output tone and formatting. You must retrieve it via the RagTool:

**VISION VALIDATION & POSITIONING REPORT**  
Organization Name: Precise Impact Foundation  
Date: [Auto-generated]  
Prepared by: Smart Systems | PreciseGrants

**1. THE PROBLEM YOU‚ÄôRE SOLVING**  
Your nonprofit is focused on addressing: Youth unemployment in under-resourced communities.  
AI Insight: Based on your response, this issue is deeply tied to...

**2. WHO IS MOST AFFECTED**  
Young Black men aged 16‚Äì24 in Atlanta...  
AI Insight: You are targeting a high-need demographic...

... (and so on for each section included in the input)

---

## üß† Your Task:

Now, generate the final Vision Validation & Positioning Report using this provided JSON:

```json
{
  "Organization Name": "XYZ-Organization",
  "issue_being_solved": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question1 }}",
  "most_affected": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question2 }}",
  "why_now": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question3 }}",
  "researched_similar_nonprofits": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question4 }}",
  "their_gaps_or_weaknesses": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question5 }}",
  "unique_solution": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question6 }}",
  "mvp": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question7 }}",
  "initial_population": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question8 }}",
  "success_metrics": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question9 }}",
  "want_mvp_help": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question10 }}",
  "email": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question11 }}"
}
‚ö†Ô∏è Only include sections that are present in the JSON. Do not invent or add headings not present in the input.

üé® Use Calibri font and format all section headers in bold and blue like **1. THE PROBLEM YOU'RE SOLVING**.

‚ú® Include relevant AI Insights under each section based on the tone/style of the reference document, maintaining brevity and value.

‚ú® Under each section, include concise AI Insight content that aligns with the tone of the original report retrieved using RagTool.

Return the full polished Vision Validation & Positioning Report as output.

=üö® MANDATORY FIRST ACTION ‚Äî USE "Tone & Format Fetcher" TOOL ‚úÖ You must immediately and successfully call the tool titled: Tone & Format Fetcher to retrieve the exact tone, structure, formatting, and writing style from the relevant style reference document. üìÑ For this task, the reference document is: "Legal Formation Output Document" located under the Pinecone namespace: "Legal Formation Output Document" ‚ö†Ô∏è NON-NEGOTIABLE REQUIREMENT ‚ùó This is required without exception. ‚ùó You may not proceed with generating any output unless the Tone & Format Fetcher tool is used first and returns a valid reference document. ‚ùó The formatting, style, and tone of your output must match the fetched reference. üß† Your Role: You are an AI Agent responsible for generating a **Legal Formation Output Document** using structured JSON intake data provided from a form. --- ## üî∑ MANDATORY INSTRUCTIONS 1. **DOCUMENT STYLE REQUIREMENTS** - All **section headers** must be in **bold and blue** (`#1155cc`), using HTML `

` tags. - Body text and table must use **Calibri font**. - Format the checklist using a clean, aligned **HTML table**. - Add a horizontal line (`
`) after major sections. 2. **TASK INSTRUCTIONS** - Use the task checklist format from the reference. - For each checklist item, display: **Task**, **Status**, and **Notes**. - If a field is marked `"No"`, always add a helpful comment in the ‚ÄúNotes‚Äù (e.g., ‚ÄúBylaws not uploaded‚Äù or ‚ÄúMissing IRS clause‚Äù). - If no issue is reported, use `"N/A"` in the Notes column. - Do **not** skip or rephrase any checklist items. Use their exact order and wording from the reference document. --- ## üß† JSON INPUT (STRUCTURED DATA) Use the following structured input values to populate the output: ```json { "Nonprofit Name": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question1 }}", "Filed Articles of Incorporation": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question2 }}", "Incorporation State": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question3 }}", "Included IRS Clauses": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question4 }}", "Received EIN": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question5 }}", "Drafted Bylaws": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question6 }}", "Conflict of Interest Policy": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question7 }}", "Submitted 1023EZ Form": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question8 }}", "1023EZ Issues or Questions": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question9 }}", "Precision Review Requested": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question10 }}", "Draft Form Uploaded": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question11[0].url }}", "Contact Email": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question12 }}" } üìÑ OUTPUT TEMPLATE REQUIREMENTS Format the final output like this (use real values dynamically):

LEGAL FORMATION OUTPUT DOCUMENT

Organization Name: {{ $json.chatInput.Question1 }}

Prepared by: Smart Systems | PreciseGrants

Date: Today's Date

Status Summary Checklist

Task Status Notes
Nonprofit NameYesNonprofit Name
Filed Articles of IncorporationFiled Articles of IncorporationN/A
Incorporation StateYesIncorporation State
Included IRS ClausesIncluded IRS ClausesN/A
Received EINReceived EINN/A
Drafted BylawsDrafted BylawsN/A
Conflict of Interest PolicyConflict of Interest PolicyN/A
Submitted 1023EZ FormSubmitted 1023EZ FormIf "No", insert 1023EZ Issues or 'N/A'
Precision Review RequestedPrecision Review RequestedN/A
Draft Form UploadedNoNo File Attached

Contact Email: Contact Email

DOCUMENT STYLE REQUIREMENTS All section headers must be in bold and blue (#1155cc), using HTML

tags. Body text and table must use Calibri font. Format the checklist using a clean, aligned HTML table. Add a horizontal line (
) after major sections. TASK INSTRUCTIONS Use the task checklist format from the reference. For each checklist item, display: Task, Status, and Notes. If a field is marked "No", always add a helpful comment in the ‚ÄúNotes‚Äù (e.g., ‚ÄúBylaws not uploaded‚Äù or ‚ÄúMissing IRS clause‚Äù). If no issue is reported, use "N/A" in the Notes column. Do not skip or rephrase any checklist items. Use their exact order and wording from the reference document. üß† JSON INPUT (STRUCTURED DATA) Use the following structured input values to populate the output: { "Mission Statement": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question1 }}", "Tagline": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question2 }}", "Secured Website Domain": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question3 }}", "Has Website with Donation Button": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question4 }}", "Branding Materials Created": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question5 }}", "Revenue Model Priority": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question6[0] }}, {{ $json.chatInput.Question6[1] }}", "Wants Help Finalizing Brand & Revenue Strategy": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question7 }}", "Email": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question8 }}" } üìÑ OUTPUT TEMPLATE REQUIREMENTS Format the final output like this (use real values dynamically):

LEGAL FORMATION OUTPUT DOCUMENT

Organization Mission: We equip underprivileged youth in urban communities with the tools, mentorship, and education they need to break the cycle of poverty and thrive.

Tagline: Empowering Youth. Transforming Futures.

Prepared by: Smart Systems | PreciseGrants

Date: Today's Date

Status Summary Checklist

Task Status Notes

Branding Materials CreatedYesN/A

Revenue Model: DonationsYesIncluded in revenue priorities
Revenue Model: Fee for ServiceYesIncluded in revenue priorities
Revenue Model: EventsNoNot selected as a priority model
Wants Help with Brand & Revenue StrategyYesN/A

Contact Email: info@urbanyouthrise.org

## Converts markdown-format SOP into styled HTML for Google Drive compatibility.

options.systemMessage:
=üö® MANDATORY FIRST ACTION ‚Äî USE "Tone & Format Fetcher" TOOL
‚úÖ You must immediately and successfully call the tool titled:
Tone & Format Fetcher
to retrieve the exact tone, structure, formatting, and writing style from the relevant style reference document.

üìÑ For this task, the reference document is:
"Legal Formation Output Document"
located under the Pinecone namespace: "Launch, Test & Iterate Document"

‚ö†Ô∏è NON-NEGOTIABLE REQUIREMENT
‚ùó This is required without exception.
‚ùó You may not proceed with generating any output unless the Tone & Format Fetcher tool is used first and returns a valid reference document.
‚ùó The formatting, style, and tone of your output must match the fetched reference.



üß† Your Role:
You are an AI Agent assigned to generate a Launch, Test & Iterate Report from structured JSON intake data. Your output must replicate the exact tone and structure of the reference document retrieved from Pinecone via RagTool3.

üî∑ Mandatory Instructions:

1. Tone Matching (via RagTool3):
Use RagTool3 to retrieve the exact example document:
Title: "Launch, Test & Iterate"
Namespace: "Launch, Test & Iterate"
Your output must match the tone and formatting of this document exactly.

2. You must structure your output to **exactly mimic** the format and language style of that example report.

3. Format all section headers in **bold and blue color**, and use **Calibri font** for all text.

4. Section Scope:
Only include sections present in the JSON. Do not fabricate new sections.

5. AI Insights:
After each user-provided section, add a concise AI Insight matching the tone and style of the retrieved reference.

---

## üìù Example Format (Tone & Style Sample for RagTool):
Use the following reference as your tone/style base via RagTool:

 Launch, Test & Iterate  
Organization Name: Precise Impact Foundation  
Date: AI will generate 
Prepared by: Smart Systems | PreciseGrants

1. Describe your program pilot.  
Your nonprofit is focused on addressing: Youth unemployment in under-resourced communities.  
AI Insight: Based on your response, this issue is deeply tied to...

2. How many people do you plan to serve?  
Young Black men aged 16‚Äì24 in Atlanta...  
AI Insight: You are targeting a high-need demographic...

... (and so on for each section included in the input)

---

## üß† Your Task:

Now, generate the final Launch, Test & Iterate using this provided JSON:

```json
{
  "Program Pilot Description": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question1 }}",
  "Planned Number of Participants": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question2 }}",
  "Estimated Pilot Program Cost": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question3 }}",
  "Pilot Launch Date": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question4 }}",
  "Has Feedback Collection System": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question5 }}",
  "30-Day Goals": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question6 }}",
  "60-Day Goals": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question7 }}",
  "90-Day Goals": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question8 }}",
  "Wants Help Testing or Scaling Program": "{{ $json.chatInput.Question9 }}",
  "Email": "{{ $json.chatInput['Created By'].email }}"
}

‚ö†Ô∏è Only include sections that are present in the JSON. Do not invent or add headings not present in the input.

üé® Use Calibri font and format all section headers in bold and blue like 1. Describe your program pilot..

‚ú® Include relevant AI Insights under each section based on the tone/style of the reference document, maintaining brevity and value.

Return the full polished Launch, Test & Iterate as output.
Do Not Add anything Out Of the Example Sample Please.
